wikipedia_page.main: Ashley MacKenzie is the founder and CEO of Base79. He is the son of Kelvin MacKenzie. Before setting up Base79 in 2007, Ashley worked as sales director at Talksport when Kelvin was in charge of the station. In July 2014 it was announced that Base79 was being sold to Rightster, with Ashley MacKenzie earning £7 million from the deal.

response: MacKenzie was an early investor in online video company Base79, established by his son Ashley MacKenzie in 2007. They sold the firm in 2014.
